episodes.title: Christians, Why Aren’t You Protecting Children? | Unfiltered Truth With Kim Kelley
episodes.description:
POV: Why don't we see Christians on the front lines of protecting children from exploitation? As a child trafficking survivor raised in a Christian cult, I’ve seen firsthand how faith can be manipulated—and how many churches stay silent when they should be leading the fight.

In this video, I’m sharing my personal story and challenging the church to step up, lead by example, and take real action to protect the innocent. This isn’t about attacking faith—it’s about holding people accountable to the values they preach.

Are churches speaking out? Are they doing anything to confront child exploitation?

You tell me: where are the real Christians? 
Let’s talk about it. 👇


#UnfilteredTruth #ProtectChildren #ExposingCults #FaithInAction #ChildSafety #Christianity #JusticeForVictims #ReligiousTrauma #SurvivorStories #ChildProtection #Christianity #ReligiousTrauma #FaithInAction

episodes.title: The Playbook of Every Cult : How They Control & Manipulate | Kim Kelley Child Safety Advocate
episodes.description:
Cults aren’t always obvious. They disguise themselves as movements, organizations, or even religious communities—until you’re deep inside and the control begins.

In this video, I break down The 10 Rules Every Cult Follows—the unspoken playbook they use to manipulate, isolate, and control their members. From forced loyalty and financial exploitation to the “us vs. them” mentality, these rules reveal the hidden tactics cults use to keep people trapped.

⚠️ Key topics covered:
🔹 The fear and isolation tactics used to control members
🔹 How cults demand loyalty, financial support, and blind faith
🔹 The psychological tricks used to make people ignore red flags
🔹 Why healing and breaking free is possible
🔹 How to recognize the signs before it’s too late

I was born and raised in a notorious international religious cult, and I know firsthand how these rules work. If you’ve ever felt manipulated, pressured, or controlled by an organization or belief system—watch this video and learn how to spot the warning signs.

What are your thoughts? Have you ever noticed these tactics in groups, workplaces, or religious movements? Let’s talk in the comments. 👇

#CultsExposed #CultSurvivor #ReligiousTrauma #MindControl #SpiritualManipulation #PsychologicalAbuse #HealingJourney #ProtectYourMind #ExposingCults #TraumaRecovery
